titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Olney High School is located in North Philadelphia. Theodore H. Nitsche, choir director, retired in 1970.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of scrapbooks covering the tenure of Theodore H. Nitsche as director of choral music at Olney High School. The scrapbooks document activities of the Olney High School A Capella Choir, the Graduate Choir, and the Olney High School Band from 1933 to 1971. The collection also includes scrapbooks covering general activities of Olney High School and a 1939 Olney High yearbook. The scrapbooks include newspaper clippings; photographs of choirs and choir members; concert programs, announcements, and invitations; church bulletin; letters of appreciation to Nitsche; lists of choir members; and ephemera.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
